summary: God's love for the world is expressed through the gift of his only Son.
Belief leads to eternal life; unbelief leads to condemnation.
Light and darkness serve as metaphors for those who accept or reject the truth.

questions.text: What does verse 22 say about baptism?
How does the light/darkness contrast speak to you?
What does it mean to come to the light?
How does verse 17 shape how you talk about faith?
